import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import history from '../../../history'; import API from '../../../service/homeservice'; class Header extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { showing: true, categoryList: [] } this.name = localStorage.getItem('name'); this.logout = this.logout.bind(this); } logout() { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('name'); history.push('/home'); } componentDidMount() { API.CategoryList(). then((findresponse) => { console.log("BannerList response===", findresponse); this.setState({ categoryList: findresponse.data.data }) console.log("data==", this.state.categoryList); }).catch( { status: 500, message: 'Internal Server Error' } ); } handleClick = (e) => { // access to e.target here console.log("e",e); } render() { const { showing } = this.state; return (
